title: Art and Technology Development Program for Students with Intellectual Disabilities Using Mobile Devices

context.additional_context: Customized Art Activity Design Utilizing Tablets and Smartphones in a BYOD Environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform at least three basic artistic expression techniques via a mobile application.
Learners can complete one creative work using digital tools and submit it for project-based assessment.
Learners demonstrate at least a 20% improvement in self-expression skills through artistic activities (based on pre- and post-assessments).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
